name: Branches, LLC
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Branches, LLC is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Bangor, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $25.4M in Medicaid payments across 28K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $25.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
